title: Director Setsuna!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Setsuna-san, listen to this! I was able to perform the script that I made with the help of you and the others with Yoshiko-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Waah! Is that true!? I wish I could’ve seen that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu. When I get better, I’m sure Yoshiko-san would also allow us to perform in front of everyone else.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I see. I’ll be looking forward to that day.... No, let’s just prepare the next script!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eeeeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You see, the book I borrowed from Hanamaru-san the other day had this really intense development.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>What was it about?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>It’s a story about two people who had a really fierce clash with each other because of their true friendship. Using that setting as a reference, I would like to make a scenario where the fallen angel Yoshiko-san and the angel Shizuku-san would have a serious competition because deep down in their hearts, they cannot forget the time they’ve spent together in the heavens.... What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Wonderful....! That’s so wonderful, Setsuna-san! I’d love to act that out with Yoshiko-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Leave it to me. But I’d like to add another character to my vision.... I wonder who I should consult this with....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
